sentence.Network_en: Aspergillus niger SL - 08 was treated by ultraviolet ( UV ) and nitrosoguanidine ( NTG ).
sentence.Network_cn: 用紫外线 ( UV ) 和亚硝基胍 ( NTG ) 等诱变剂对黑曲霉菌株SL-08进行诱变处理,结果表明:不同的诱变手段在对菌株的致死率和变异幅度上均有差异.

sentence.Network_en: A paraglider casts a shadow over the dunes of Niger's T é n é r é desert.
sentence.Network_cn: 在尼日尔的泰内雷沙漠中,一张滑翔伞在沙丘上投下了影子.

sentence.Network_en: Niger's 1999 constitution prohibits any amendment regarding the president's term of office.
sentence.Network_cn: 尼日尔1999年的宪法禁止对有关总统任期的条款进行任何的修正.

means.word_mean: 1. the family of languages that includes most of the languages spoken in Africa south of the Sahara; the majority of them are tonal languages but there are important exceptions (e.g., Swahili or Fula)

auth_sentence.content: So what do people in the Niger Delta think?
auth_sentence.res_content: So what do people in the Niger Delta think?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So what do people in the Niger Delta think?

auth_sentence.content: Remember Hamadou Djibo Issaka, the rower from Niger?
auth_sentence.res_content: Remember Hamadou Djibo Issaka, the rower from Niger?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Remember Hamadou Djibo Issaka, the rower from Niger?

auth_sentence.content: I thought Niger was being blown off the map.
